meanings.definition: The time in the morning when the sun appears above the horizon.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the sunrise brings light to the world.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the sunrise with my family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The sunrise peeked through the curtains, waking me up gently.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sunrise, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The colors and light visible in the sky when the sun appears above the horizon.
meanings.sent1: The sunrise painted the clouds in a beautiful array of colors.
meanings.sent2: As the sunrise spread across the sky, everything seemed to glow.
meanings.sent3: The sunrise looked like a giant painting in the sky, changing every minute.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with warmth, like a sunrise on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise reflected on the lake, creating a mesmerizing scene.
